SEARCH
Package io.goobi.viewer.model.viewer.record.views

Enum Class FileType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<FileType>
io.goobi.viewer.model.viewer.record.views.FileType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<FileType>, Constable
public enum FileType extends Enum<FileType>
An enum of possible file types available for a record. Used to check if a record or page contains a specific filetype

    • getContentTypeFor

      public static String getContentTypeFor(String filename) throws ContentTypeException
      Attempt to determine mimetype of a filename by suffix analysis only, without filesystem access
      Parameters:
      filename - the filename to parse
      Returns:
      the appropriate mimetype. May be an empty String if the filename is blank or has no suffix; but is never null
      Throws:
      ContentTypeException - If not mimetype could be determined
